question: Which state government has launched Mission Lakadong to produce 50,000 metric tonnes of the famous Lakadong turmeric per annum in the next five years?
explanation: Meghalaya has launched Mission Lakadong to produce 50,000 metric tonnes of the famous Lakadong turmeric per annum in the next five years. This mission has been launched with the objective of enhancing the livelihood of farmers and building the brand equity of the Lakadong variety. The state government had proposed an investment of Rs 75 crore for the promotion of Lakadong turmeric. Lakadong is a village in the West Jaintia Hills. This turmeric is famous because of its high curcumin content (<5.5).
